Building

Apt Features

  • High Floor(26th)
  • Luxury waterfront building (Shore Club North Tower)
  • South facing corner Unit with tons of light
  • 925 sq. ft + balcony
  • Beautiful Spacious and bright 1 bedroom/1 baths
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows
  • Hardwood floors
  • Nice big balcony with beautiful views
  • Gourmet island kitchen with gas stove, granite counters, maple cabinets and breakfast bar
  • Bathroom features a tub with a shower and dual sinks
  • Top of the line stainless steel appliances
  • Washer/Dryer in the unit
  • Central AC and heating
  • Spectacular downtown NYC views from each room

Building Amenities

  • 24 hour Doorman & Concierge
  • Fully equipped gym
  • Updated Steam, Sauna and Jacuzzi
  • Updated Screening room
  • Updated Resident Lounge with Party Room
  • Roof deck with river/NYC views
  • Children's play room
  • Conference room
  • Business lounge
  • Bike storage room
  • Access to parking garage from inside the building (additional charge)
  • Storage(BarGold) in the building (additional charge)
  • The building is Verizon FiOS & Direct TV enabled

Building Location

  • Easy access to NYC (5 minutes walk to PATH Station and Ferry)
  • Short distance to Newport, Hoboken path stations & light rail
  • Morton Williams Grocery store, Newport Spirits, Dry Cleaners & HSBC bank below the building
  • BweCafe, Pizzeria & CarePoint Health Medical Group around the corner
  • Hair and Nail salon across the street
  • Short distance to Newport mall, Veterinary, Starbucks, Staples, Target, Best Buy, ACME, Duane Reade, restaurants and major banks
  • Close proximity to the Board Walk , Newport Green Park and Newport Beach sand area
